caption.center: TERRITORY OF HAWAII v. JUNE Y. SCRUGGS.

opinion.panel: RICE, C.J., STAINBACK AND MARUMOTO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
The petition for rehearing presents no new points or legal propositions that were not argued and duly considered by the court in its opinion.
Petition denied.
opinion.attorneys: Hyman M. Greenstein for the petition.Page 119
